headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Paycom’s Q2 Earnings Call
summary: Paycom’s second quarter results drew a positive response from the market, with management attributing outperformance to strong recurring revenue growth and expanded operating margins. CEO Chad Richison highlighted the release of IWant—an AI-powered, command-driven interface—as a major milestone, noting that it streamlines access to Paycom’s platform and enhances user engagement across all roles. Management cited record sales activity and efficiency gains from automation as key contributors to th
